changelog.releases:
0.14.0 January 2019 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.14.0 add compatiblity for JDK11, upgrade Apache BookKeeper to 4.7.3 and other minor fixes
0.13.0 June 2018 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.13.0 add compatiblity for JDK10, upgrade Apache BookKeeper to 4.7.0 and other minor fixes
0.13.0 June 2018 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.13.0 add compatiblity for JDK10, upgrade Apache BookKeeper to 4.7.0 and other minor fixes
0.12.0 December 2017 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.12.0 is a bugfix release
0.11.0 November 2017 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.11.0 introduces delayed tasks
0.10.0 April 2017 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.10.0 introduces Netty 4.1, OpenSsl and Native Epool on linux
0.9.0 March 2017 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.9.0 introduces a per-user JVM hard limit of resource allocation
0.8.0 January 2017 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.8.0 introduces the WebUI
0.7.0 November 2016 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.7.0 introduces SASL/Kerberos authentication
0.6.0 September 2016 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.6.0 introduces Custom Resources
0.5.0 July 2016 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.5.0 is a bugfix release
0.4.0 June 2016 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.4.0 update BookKeeper to 4.4.0
0.3.0 February 2016 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.3.0 is a bugfix release
0.2.0 December 2015 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.2.0 introduces new utility class TaskSubmitter to serialize executors code s
0.1.0 November 2015 https://github.com/diennea/majordodo/releases Majordodo 0.1.0 is first public release
